# compol

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/Dalcatruz/compol.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/Dalcatruz/compol)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of compol is to provide functionality to the content of political and electoral behavior.

## Installation
You can install the released version of compol from and with:

``` r
library(devtools)
install_github("Dalcatruz/compol")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Dalcatruz/compol")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(compol)
## basic example code
```
